content: Been using this app for years, loved it and never had an issue. As of last week, the app keeps switching to French and no matter how many times I click the English option and save (i have to Google how to change the language setting, since its not even possible to find thr setting in app), it either half translates or doesn't save my preference. The desktop site has my preference saved. I am in Quebec, so maybe has something to do with it, but this is beyond frustrating to deal with.

Amazon, you are circling the drain. The version installed on my phone cannot be altered, uninstalled or accessable to any settings or preferences. My icon shows a brown box with the trademark smile on my Motorola phone. My old Galaxy that I use for books and data has the old regular app with the shopping cart. How about you quit selling me more of something that doesn't interest me (what ARE you doing with my algorithms?!?) and focus on what I have ordered.

I've had a prime membership for 10 years, and I love Amazon. I really want to give the Amazon Shopping app 5 stars, but I can't. It's BAD! And it keeps getting worse over time. I purchase items on Amazon to get good products at a good, competitive, price, so I use filters. But they are useless!!! You can't specify your own price range and putting price in the description doesn't work at all. The other filters results are so inaccurate, they're worthless and keep getting worse. That's why 1 star.

my phone did an updated then the app disappears, does not show up anywhere on the phone... go to the app store and it has an enable button, it does not work! It is stuck, It never changes from enable... I get a quick look at the update choice and then right back to the enable screen! I can't delete what does not show up so I can't reload the app.

UI is constantly changing, leading to a disjointed experience with the app. "Orders" page is constantly buggy, often not loading. Several times I have had delivery personel deliver packages by throwing it at my door... never enough packaging in the boxes, and sometimes the thin paper tape is torn or not put on properly to seal the box. Returns are confusing, and they make you drive to a Whole Foods or a participating UPS store to make a return when they screw something up... highly frustrating.

HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE. I ended up paying for a free subscription that Amazon offered. Initially,I was told by a agent what the issue was, but they would follow up with a resolution, and to not cancel. They never followed up.I did and kept being transferred from agent to agent. 10+ agents later, I was hung up on multiple times and agents disconnected from chats. If your clueless just say that, then find me someone that can help. I reached out on all platforms, no resolution,so I cancelled!!!

I used to use Amazon for everything, until their app became so slow and unbelievably frustrating. It takes forever to load, will freeze up, or just send me to a blank screen. The important filters are gone, you really don't know who you're ordering from. My husband purchased some clothes only to find out it would take two months for everything to arrive! Stupid ads for stuff I don't need and wasn't looking for everywhere. Amazon is failing hard.

They relentlessly push you to sign up for Amazon Prime, so much so that you need to be very careful when navigating through a purchase. Recently, when I was placing an order, I inadvertently clicked on a button that appeared to complete the transaction. Unknowingly, it signed me up for Amazon Prime. I reached out to Amazon to let them know I didn't want Prime. I made several attempts via the app and email to cancel the transaction and subscription. It took over 10 steps to finally cancel.

Amazon isn't what it used to be. The last 5 items I've ordered has either arrived wrong or never shipped at all (there was months between orders) when calling customer service, it always turned into a nightmare of misunderstanding, due to them not speaking English, or outright lies. Save yourself the trouble and shop on ebay. Or anywhere else. Prices are similar and at least ebay cracks down on the B.S when it's needed. (BTW, my last order was a book. Amazon is KNOWN for books and still failed)

This app still doesn't work properly. I had problems using it on an older tablet. Bought a new tablet recently and still have issues. Pop up windows don't function properly. All I see is a copy of the screen behind the window, inside the window. Doesn't help me trying to see a product "in use" before purchase. Curious why other Amazon apps work without issues, but this one does not?

Good app and good service. I do have one issue and I can't be the only one. Under the Android settings in developer options, there's an option for "Force Dark Mode" under Hardware Accelerated Rendering. This works well with the app except when searching. The text is white and so is the text box, so it's impossible to see what you're typing. I feel like this could easily be fixed.

The search engine kills the experience. It is very difficult to find the item being searched for. Often times, there are too many listings for a certain item that appears to be the exact same thing with slightly different wording and different prices. I have copied key words from titles of items and searched for them and still, the listing I copied is buried in the results. I might find it by clicking something related and then look through the window of related items I might actually find it.

Used to be a great service. Now the price keeps going up and service continues to decline. Delivery windows are increasingly incorrect. My orders continue to be delivered to the incorrect address. What happened to the decent service? No delivery notifications, no pictures of where it was delivered. You have to comb through tons and tons of reviews just to make sure what your purchasing is accurate and not some p.o.s. , which it usually is anyways. The app almost never works correctly either.

I would probably order even more than I do if I could view my lists. Most of the time I can't scroll down on the app so I have to type in what I remember is on my list when I want to order something. This is a longstanding glitch that never seems to be fixed. I have a Samsung S9+ and it works fine with every other app on the phone. I hope someone fixes the issue soon.

Quickly becoming my most avoided shopping app due to the fact that there's absolutely NO WAY to filter out the international vendors from the rest. At least on eBay you can. I purchased a razor that after a few months I thought "where is this razor???" So when I tracked it it's apparently on a slow boat from China which I would avoid on eBay but Amazon you don't find out until it's too late. Thank God for refunds but still need to provide a filter.

I've been an Amazon customer since 2012 and I'm about to cancel my subscription. Between them raising the subscription price and just about every single time I place an order for a new item 9 times out of 10 I receive an item with an LPN label which I'm pretty sure means it's been previously bought and returned. The convience isn't even worth the price anymore.

App does not show certain products' images only when you tap on them to get a closer zoomed in view. It does not happen on all images. It does not happen on cellular connection. Weird issue. Not sure if it's the app or my Wi-Fi (Orbi router and satellites) or my phone. Issue does not happen on my laptop. Need to try on another phone to rule out Wi-Fi issue.

Our experience was great until recently when the Alexa bubble began haunting the sidelines of app screens. And, the scrolling become locked in same products at times, probably to force longer viewing of that venders product. I tried to toggle off as many permissions as I could find related to the Alexa prompt or standby bubble. It is still lurking on screen. I'm quite capable of finding what I need or will use different device.

constant crashing if you have firewall ad blocking. Worked fine for years up until recently. If you can't figure out the names of all the ad servers the app just throws CS3 errors while browsing or doing anything and refuses to work. Easy enough to just not use the app or buy things from Amazon but it would be nice if they fix this.

Tablet version has super annoying time limited deal offer popups that I hate and can't figure out how to turn off. I consider myself pretty tech friendly, so it's extra annoying to me that I can't find a setting for this - ended up just turning off all notifications from the app, even though it's nice to get them when things ship or have arrived.

This is just the worst search engine within a shopping all I have ever seen. The website is a little better. But the app makes it nearly impossible to narrow down what you're looking for selecting a category then filtering what you're looking for. For some of the better shopping search engines I've used, see ebay or wayfair. There's definitely room for improvement but they've pretty much got it down.

Customer service is based in India and a few of them are extremely rude for no reason. They also do not know how to do anything except returns, refunds, and replacements so if you have concerns about your account they are useless and cannot help. Things almost never arrive in 2 days anymore. Amazon Music subscription is constantly pushed on you and they have charged me for it despite me not signing up for it. I've cancelled all my subscribe and save and started buying in brick and mortar stores.

Well, I hate the app a little less than I used to. It went from 1 to 2 stars. Load time is better. I'm not sure it uses any less battery power. It's useless if it doesn't save battery since I have unlimited data on my phone, so data isn't an issue. Unfortunately it's the only way to chat with customer service. After chat, I uninstalled a 3rd time. I will install it again only when I need to chat with customer service.

App keeps malfunctioning. When typing in the search bar, It pulls up previous things that you searched but they all look like 1990s simple entries with exes under them. I know it's a malfunction because I uninstalled and reinstalled and it was corrected but now it's doing it again. I've already cleared cash and all that so please don't suggest those simple fixes.

A fully automated, inefficient, irresponsible company, lacking any sort of accountability. There is nothing you can trace or report to anyone. Poor customers and sellers are both in jeopardy. Stuff is good but most of that has nothing to do with Amazon. If they choose efficiency over laziness, choose accountability over an outward show, they might improve but with my last few orders, the issues and the way Amazon dealt with it, I highly doubt it.

I'm Addicted! Great prices! I can literally find anything I'm looking for on Amazon. Not only do they give you they're price, but show you other sellers who may be cheaper with the same product and help you order from whichever you choose. If by some chance something is not right with your order, they immediately look into it and fix the situation. Amazon is Amazing!

The app is pure junk when it comes to returns and shipping. My orders that are lost I can't even view unless I switch it to view orders within the last 30 days. Amazon continually bumps out shipping times with no way to contact customer service until they tell you it's lost. I have lost 5 packages within 30 days. Prime shipments are arriving weeks late. Other companies do shipping and customer service so much better.

Since Nov constantly gives "Uh oh something went wrong on our end" error message with the dog pic. Only way I have figured to get rid of this is to uninstall and reinstall the app. I have to do that every other day or sometimes same day. Beyond frustrating and Amazon is probably losing business from me because I forget what I was going to look for by the time I get the app installed again half the time.

I'm so frustrated everytime I order something they try and deliver it to a completely different place except today they somehow managed to get it delivered (still to the wrong address) and I'm not sure if it's Amazon that is messing up or the carrier. If I order something off another website it gets delivered to my house but for some reason with Amazon it won't. Im so insanely frustrated with this. Please fix .

Very frustrating returning multiple items &keep track of what goes with which label.Say you order multiple pairs of jeans, same brand, that only slightly vary in color.There's not enough in the description to determine which pair it is, have to open each order, then return to the list of your orders.It refreshes the list and changes the order of the items, EVERY SINGLE TIME! Makes it very difficult to keep track of. Trying to communicate with customer service via chat is a nightmare! Phone #?!?

DOES ANYONE AT AMAZON EVEN READ THESE APP REVIEWS? RHETORICAL QUESTION. A W F U L APP. Lists do not scroll. It's like a rubber and, springing back. ALSO, when you scroll through "Your Orders", you can select an item, read it's description, and when you go back to your list, it brings you back to the beginning of the list instead of being able to continue reviewing the list from the point you were at. Now you need to go through the list AGAIN.

The app stopped working for several days. It would give an error message from Amazon. I have uninstalled it from my phone. I am able to open other apps without a problem. Audible, prime video and prime photos work just fine. Only Amazon shopping is not working at all.

I think Amazon shopping is the absolute best of all the online shopping. I personally like to only shop Amazon. The shopping, especially if you join Prime( which has lots of other benefits other than shopping) Shipping is free, Amazon fresh has great produce, as well as meat,eggs etc. Never had an issue customer service didn't handle quickly, no Hassel. There is even a try on and pay only if you keep it..what other app does that!!! So, go for the experience, door to door delivery & stay.

Used to be half decent but the last update made the search refining options a joke. Every selection automatically throws you out of the menu meaning instead of being able to click down through the list like you used to in order to get the level of filtration you want you have to start at the top and work your way down one step at a time. This last update seems to have made it even worse.

I was a loyal Prime member for years. I loathe using the Amazon app anymore. They constantly change the interface and move features around making it harder to use than it should be. I have several Kindles and managing the content is problematic with the constant updates and moving of features. In the end, between the app changes, steady increase in Prime membership and sloppy Amazon delivery, I am no longer a Prime member,nor do I allow my Amazon shopping app to auto update.

Fix it please... This app has recently just stopped working properly. I have had the app crash on me, and when I try to see th a orders I've placed and track them, the screen just repeatedly refreshes itself, and NEVER ends up loading. Please fix these issues and provide an update. I love this app, but its proving my membership to be more difficult than it's truly worth.

I don't know what's happened with this app but it's not opening up my orders page. It'll open up other areas or for searches but will either take too long or won't open my orders at all. I've never had a problem with Amazon's app before and I use it very often to buy items. They need to figure out the problem or glitch! I thought it may have been my phone so I restarted it and nope it didn't help. This is ridiculous!

Whenever I open the app there is an unexpected action like trying to join prime or checking out things in my cart when I'm not ready to order. Seems like it's deceptive and pushy. If there's a free shipping option, it's never the default shipping method. I uninstalled it because I want control of my interactions with Amazon not have an app trying to control me.

I love the fast customer service texting feature, I haven't had another problem since this was added instead of having to call and be connected to an automated voice messaging system. Only problem I do have is how some sellers don't provide the tracking numbers for you to track it yourself. Sometimes the sellers don't respond back to you when you ask where your package is at.

Why can't i get an invoice in the app and im not talking about the "order total". Whats the point of the app if there's less that i can access? I really need an invoice for my orders. After i make a purchase using the app i still have to go to the website just for an invoice. That's annoying. Might as well just not have an app. And not even an option to request an invoice.

Great app, my old review was out of date. Amazing did the things I'd wanted to see (merge Go into the main app for example). My only complaint is that I wish it were faster. To open my orders on a pixel 4a us tedious to wait for the page of useless boxes (from the hamburger menu) to open just so I can get to my orders. I'd like to see a bottom tool bar quick navigation to my orders. Update: Amazon added quick link to orders directly from home screen long press. My last complaint gone.

Please fix your search and filter options. Generally app is good for buying stuff (basket etc), but trawling through gazillions of products without great filters is really annoying. Is it really that difficult to add filters after a category is selected - even basic stuff like colour or dimensions? How useful is it to filter by (the numerous Chinese) sellers? Come on, Amazon, you can do much better!

Very average app. Not particularly easy to use, and when searching, it throws up random strange results. Haven't had the app for long but not feeling enthusiastic about using it. Should be easier than it is. Also, looks like it was designed in the early days of apps. Ugly. Surprising from one of the world's biggest companies. Disappointing.

The drivers have failed to deliver my orders more than they have managed to deliver them properly, and I am honestly quite tired of having to seek customer service every single time I make an order. Very disappointing. When I actually recieve my packages, its usually always a great experience and fast shipping. I feel like they need more control in their amazon delivery drivers, and seek out these issues further because its very much a hassle and also concerning.

Until recently my experience was 5 stars Now maybe 3. I've subscribed since 2017 and always enjoyed the prime video. I've also enjoyed shopping and had no problems until recently. My payment method is not updating and therefore my subscription has been suspended and van get no further. Trying to resolve without canceling subscription but may have no other alternative.

App is fine to use for shopping and browsing. The main suggestions I have for improvements are: 1: The app needs a way for customer to mark an order as received. Delivery times for me have been super fast but because the order status can't be updated from 'on the way' I keep getting emails apologising for the delay for items I've already received. 2: It's hard to find the help chat within the app and chat is lost if window is left. 3: Better search function for items shipped from Australia.

Amazon has started allowing sellers to remove Sold By Shipped By, so they can gallon you a product is made in a specific county, and there's no way to verify where the company is based. For example, made in the U.S. but very unlikely. Previously, I disabled notifications for this app, and that disabled Smile donations without notifying me. Odd, donations are dependent on having notifications enabled. Sneaky buggers.

Amazon is the greatest shopping app ever! Two and one day shipping is incredible that no one can duplicate! They have a wider selection of products than Wal Mart and more items to choose from and prime membership gets you access to EVERYTHING associated with Amazon! Fast delivery music movies books etc I don't care the price is going up for membership either. As much as they offer for it and as much as I'm paying I thought I was gonna get in trouble for over using it üòÇüòÇüòÇ

Amazon's service is getting awful. I LOVED Amazon! Literally purchased 10s of thousands of dollars here. But recently they keep on losing my packages. Don't have a 2 day prime delivery date for ANY item. I called multiple times they say they will fix the problem but never do. I have been using this service for about 5 years and grew to love the service but ever since they teamed up with USPS, UPS & FEDEX the service has gotten awful. I will for sure not be using this service again!! AWFUL!

I loved this app for its ease of use. Ive had it installed on my phone for years. But today I cancelled it. I needed to archive some previous orders from prying eyes. Well after several frustrating hours, I realized (dispite the instructions), archiving is not a feature of the app. Had to log in to the website and selecte desktop view to have access to the archive order feature. IMO Amazo is the best online retailer. But what I went through today is my tipping point. UNABLE TO LOGOFF APP.

Issues I have with app are, 1. The app opens with a blank white screen everytime it's newly opened (not from RAM). Everytime I have to bress back button to go to working main page. 2. Review with Images and Review with Videos is super laggy. Touch response is very late too. The swipe mode barely works. Please fix these issues.

I love this app & service but i really wish there was an easier way to sort out your wish list. I have a huge wish list & want to categorize it but you can only move 1 item at a time then it starts you back at the beginning of the list & you have to scroll back down to where you were. Oh but wait that usually glitches & makes me go back to the other screen before it'll let me scroll again. I literally love everything else but this is frustrating. An option to multiselect would be awesome!

Too complicated app,web. Too difficult to find related things. Adverts, related products pop up every where, too exaggerated. Payment steps not clear I have no idea after completing checkout steps whether it is charged or will be charged. Sorting does not work. Hidden prices arise at the end step of the checkout. Shows free product but on one click purchase it just costs some value. Packing fee is not explicit you need to be careful to see that at the last step in checkout. Be careful at last steps suprise price increases without any notification

App is fairly hard to use; super sensitive while scrolling through items, no response when trying to use specific links or buttons. Its like the app itaelf doesnt want to be used, its so frustrating. Im not renewing prime because its not worth wanting to throw my phone every time i try to order common supplies or save a fun item to a wishlist for later. Several updates over the last year have shown me this company doesnt care about these issues.

So I recently updated the app and I wish I didn't. Usually, I checkout and use different methods of payment. Such as, using a promo, then covering the rest w/ gift cards/rewards points, etc. This last order I placed didn't let me. It only let me use 1 form of payment. I don't like that. You should be able to use promo credit, gift card/rewards, etc, if you have it. It was better this way. Please change it back. I can understand not using two different reward points from different credit cards.

It's been pretty good, but the forced move away from the Whole Foods app was the biggest mistake ever. I liked the interface on the WF app. It was WAY better at helping you "buy again", and every time I'm shopping for WF now, and I enter something in the search bar, it searches ALL of Amazon. Not needed. Way to muck things up here people.

App itself is nice. Amazon is convenient. Funny thought how no permissions are granted yet sights and sounds directly and instantly affect recommendations. You might work on hiding the spying a bit better. And bonus tip: when a customer screams "*UCKING SPIDERS" they probably aren't the kind of person that would like to buy them to eat. Creepy part is when the recommendations aren't based on sound.

I just updated it , and it still works the same. It wont even let me do nothing with my payment to continue and purchase what i need . im getting very fustrated with it. Ps was never contacted once i emailed my problem. I had to call them . I loved Amazon for the last couple of years. But now its pretty awful . I have to have a credit card in file to make a purchase with a gift card? That doesnt make sense .

Since updating this app december 29, 2021, I've had one problem after another. I keep getting " uh oh something went wrong on our end" or " Amazon might be temporarily down or it may have moved to a new web address" it's so annoying when an app is working just fine then along comes an upgrade to mess it all up.

I had my phone replaced and can't get into my account since the 2 step process sends the code to my old phone. Called tech and was changed to 1 step. Called support to help in changing my number but they were no help. Said I have to create a new account. That means I'll lose all my Kindle books. I wouldn't even give them a star. Only did to lodge my complaint. So I'll delete that app and never use it again. Thanks for nothing Amazon!

There is no way to go back to what you were looking at previously. Seriously, an app from a company as huge as Amazon without a back button is the biggest blunder in app design history. Congrats on being that stupid. UPDATE: App still sucks and delivery drivers cant find my new house that is marked in several locations and easily found on Google Maps.

Can only search through the search button. Like if I want a PC I have to search PC. I have to go to their site on my PC to browse by department and not having to browse through a keyword. I also can't browse through my phone since all the Amazon links go to the app.

Filters really let it down. I tend to shop elsewhere a lot of times because of the filters. You cant for example shop "low to high" despite the option being there. Because suddenly half the items disappear. Why? Or the first 100 results are nothing like what you typed in the search bar. Tried to search 1/16 dolls house stuff. Only brings up 1/12. So straight over to Ebay. A filter for UK only would be cool. So i can shop locally. (Eco friendly.) And a where the item was manufactured filter.

Feature-wise this app suffers from the same kind of change-for-the-sake-of-change problem many good apps suffer from which over time has been making it needlessly convoluted. Service wise Amazon has been implementing more and more sleezy tactics (returns not marked recieved until you call, shipping labels requiring out-of-pocket payment, shipping reimbursed for less than actual shipping, and most recently undisclosed restocking fees) providing good reason to explore other options.

They lost much of my resect due to a check box mistake. It was suggested to return the item, but it is wrong to devalue their own services and products from my simple human error. The simple solution would be to acknowledge my mistake of not clicking the checkbox by fixing this issue of being debted unnecessary interest. No way would anyone really believe it is good business to devalue a product sold being returned based on a simple human error. The financial side lacks control. Canceling soon.

Worst app ever. Absolutely no care about user experience. It such a pitty that in 2022 having such possibilities you don't care doing anything better. Such a complicated app with nested menus, submenus whatever...it takes tones of time and effort to find what you want and do what you want. Try for instance signing out. Takes some time till you give up trying.

I've been an amazon customer since 2016, I have been using amazon all the time. But, recently on the app it won't allow me to delete certain items in my baskets. I'm not sure if this is a glitch or what but my mother has been having issues with deleting items from her basket as well and the accounts are separate. It's frustrating having to do orders one at a time. Back to 5 stars when this is sorted out

Ordered an item from wish and Amazon on the same day using 2-day shipping with Amazon and the wish item has arrived but the Amazon item has not even shipped (this is the second time trying to make the same order on Amazon and the second time it has never shipped) and since they do not offer a refund until the item has shipped they can keep your money indefinitely. Absolute scam will never buy from them again.

Disgraceful customer service. They don't check what's being listed so the listing can say anything they want and then you have to argue for a refund when you receive something different. Mp3 music once bought is blocked from being downloaded to devices so what the point in that? Have deleted all apps now and will NEVER go back

Enabling Microphone permissions and using Alexa two or three times inside the app disables any digital assistant outside the app. I like shopping with prime but purchasing mp3 music on Amazon music is a hassle. It redirects you to Amazon shopping and lets you purchase multiple mp3 songs you already own as it doesnt tell you "you already own this"on amazon shopping -which is the only place you can purchase such items. The Heck. You have to call to cancel your order for digital products too üôÑ.

Delivery information pops up at inconvenient times but isn't otherwise accessible. Delivery photo and feedback disappear almost instantly, making it difficult to find packages. Shopping is easy and checkout is very quick, but with some money-saving options difficult to find.

Great app, just wish .... there was a way to use to cards and pay at the same time. My husband and I thought it would be great if there was an option to split pay the bill down the middle. Just another option of paying and not just one card to pay but two to split. Other then that a great app. Thanks.

So slow lately, I can rarely look at the orders it always says something went wrong to try again but it rarely works now. It takes forever for anything to load AND on top of all that your raising prices and hardly anything comes in 2 days anymore. I get everything is slower but don't raise your prices for a service you can't guarantee anymore!

The app itself is great. But one of the most frustrating things is when I click a link on Google or social media it opens the app and then nothing happens. It does not go to the product. I kill the app three or four times or I clear the cache and then it works. It's very glitchy

Only problem i have is with the app. Every time i take something from my cart and save it for later or delete it, it doesnt do it right away. The screen then jumps to the top of my cart. Several times ill then have to scroll back down and try again until it finally does it. Just an annoying bug is all

When I'm in support chat and trying to type, the messages can't be scrolled up so I can't see or tell what I'm typing.. the keyboard is just stuck there. Please fix!! Also, why is the option to get an invoice no longer there on the app? Instead I have type a separate link and type in the order number in the link in order to obtain an invoice for a certain order.

Why bother w/prime membership @higher cost: no longer have guaranteed fast shipping, no longer have reliable high quality results in searching with filters that don't really filter BS from legitimate schills, no longer have access to prime video content without yet another monthly subscription to 3rd party app-only to have to rent or buy the content, no longer able to mirror to the fire TV stick-also purchased to view content, no longer have US based support with all the issues encountered.

Amazon sent me the wrong item when i ordered 2 fire sticks for Christmas. I contacted Amazon and they immediately sent me the fire sticks with instructions on how to return the wrong item i had received. I returned the item and was still charged for it. Amazon hasn't refunded my money. Not very happy with Amazon right now. I'm thinking I might just have ti start shopping on eBay again

The UI update has been great. One feature request would to have less clicks to get the Amazon Locker Codes. Right now you need to to go to Orders, then select the order, and then select "track status". It'd be nice to have the code show up on the orders page.

To many permissions & forced to install to contact support, stopped using an older version as it was trying to track movements as it constantly came up to activate location services even when I didn't have App open. Just crashed during a support messaging.

It annoys me that my Amazon prime delivery doesn't come in one box but several (what a waste of packaging) and another thing that annoys me is that it gives you the option of up to 8 weeks yet it only allows you to do 6 months it won't let you pick 7 or 8 months, why is this option turned off?

It was great now it's horrible. I can't check my orders. That page doesn't load anymore. At all....and the search results are laughable. The most random, not even close items appear. Like I could try ladies tops and lawn furniture will show. Definitely needs some tweeking.

Amazon guts local businesses, charges for Prime Video ( while still charging fees for most features), and their drivers continually drive through my property as a short cut. My repeated attempts to contact someone and discuss it are ignored, even the drivers I've cornered never seem to pass the word along. It's getting more and more frustrating, but Amazon is apparently too big to care. #BoycottAmazon

I've ordered items from Amazon twice and got screwed both times! The first time they charge me for Amazon Prime when I didn't even want Amazon Prime! The second time they charged me for shipping when it was free! When I ask for my money back she gave me an Amazon card that I did not want either

Every time I try to pay for my items I get the message saying "yes I would like to try Amazon prime" at the top of Every action that I make. Please stop trying to force prime on your customers, put a different message like" would you consider joining Amazon prime?" With the choices "yes or no" That's it... and if I choose no That's the end of it and you should stop showing it every time I go to a different page while trying to finish my purchase.

I had to download this app in order to chat with customer service. The keyboard would block have of my conversation and I couldn't see my text as I typed. Then it crashed and I got put with a different agent who couldn't load my last session, so I had to describe my situation all over again. I am using a Samsung A51.

No longer an option to clear browsing history, only toggle history on/off. This needs to be fixed. Items in basket will not be purchased until you sort this. You still haven't fixed the lousy price search filters either.
